title: Healing
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Health
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/AIDS (Disease)
description: Judith is teaching in Thailand as a young teacher. It is an extraordinary cultural experience and also life changing as Judith is diagnosed with HIV. This story delves into the psyche of a young woman coming to terms with the taboos and limitations of the virus she has contracted.
